I too was going to answer this with “Highly Suspect” but I noticed that no one has mentioned the song that was written by Dorsey Burnette and released in 1960. Not surprising, since most who post on Quora are of a much younger generation than I. Glen Campbell did a version of it too. Lyrics are as follows: Hey little one, so far from home, and so alone Hey little one, I’m just like you, I’m lonely too The road of life is a long long road, when you walk alone Then I found you, I found a love, a love I’ve never known Hey hey hey hey little one, don’t go away, tell me you’ll stay Hey hey hey hey little one, I’m just like you, I’m so lonely too
